testsuite-ext.profile: Test Suite for OOC Core Library

testcases.test: This is not a test case. Rather, it prepares an Oakwood compliant module Out to supersede OOC's differing module of the same name.
Tests the Length function with 0X terminated character arrays.
Tests the Assign function with 0X terminated source character arrays. Truncation happens if the destination array is not large enough.
Tests the Extract function with range parameters that are within the limits of the input and output string.
Tests the Extract function with range parameters that exceed the length of the source string.
Tests the Extract function with a result that must be truncated to fit into the destination string.
Tests the Delete function with range parameters that are within the limits of the input string.
Call delete on string ranges Delete beyond the end of the input string, and after the end of the string.
Calls the Insert function to insert substrings before, after, and into another string. The results fit into the destination array.
Insert is a noop if startPos is larger than the string's length.
Output string must be truncated by Insert if the result is too long.
